meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #757.

div.div: Missing first 10 clues of the Jeopardy! Round.

td.p: Robin Maisel, an attorney from Long Beach, California
Winona Phillips, an owner of a limousine service originally from Manhattan Beach, California

tr.td: WORD ORIGINS
GUINNESS RECORDS
CHARLESTON, S.C.
MATHEMATICS
TV TAKEOVERS
"DARK" SONGS

There\'s a boat dat\'s leavin\' soon for New York
Come wid me
Dat\'s where you belong...')

tr.td:
Though written in '35 & set in Charleston, this show, featuring the following, didn't play there until 1970:
There's a boat dat's leavin' soon for New York
Come wid me
Dat's where you belong...

tr.td: Stephanie
Winona
Robin
FRENCH LITERATURE
PRESIDENTIAL TRIVIA
SPORTS
TEXTILES
SCIENTIFIC SPELLING
(Alex: In this category, you must spell the important word in each response.)

')

tr.td: Stephanie
Winona
Robin

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Alex reads Winona\'s response as "Greenland and Iceland".]
...
(Alex: [To Stephanie] Greenland is not a country, it\'s part of Denmark.)
...
(Alex: The 2 countries are [*], you got that right, and the other one was [*], with the capital being Bangkok, and the capital of [*], or course, Reykjavik.)
WinonaWhat are Greenland and Ireland?
$1,200
StephanieWhat are Greenland & Finland Iceland?
$4,100
RobinWhat are Denmark & __
$100
Iceland and Thailand')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The only 2 countries whose capitals end in "K", their names both end in "land"')

tr.td: WORLD GEOGRAPHY
The only 2 countries whose capitals end in "K", their names both end in "land"
Stephanie
Winona
Robin
2nd place: Keller bedroom furniture + Helix TV/clock radio
3rd place: Krementz his & her signet rings
New champion: $8,000
Stephanie
Winona
Robin

15 R
(including 1 DD),
3 W

20 R
(including 1 DD),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans.
